name: n i n e l i v e z
name_original: n i n e l i v e z
description:
Created for Mini Jam 127 as of 3-5-23.

Brutal, old-school platformer laced with tight controls and soaked in unforgiveness.

Play in Fullscreen mode for the intended experience.

By popular opinion: much, much more coming soon!

Feedback is appreciated as development ensues.
